thread.title: RUN FOR THE WASP 5-K Race, 1.3 Mile Fun Walk & Kids Run
thread.title_full: RUN FOR THE WASP 5-K Race, 1.3 Mile Fun Walk & Kids Run

title: RUN FOR THE WASP 5-K Race, 1.3 Mile Fun Walk & Kids Run
text:
RUN FOR THE WASP 5-K Race, 1.3 Mile Fun Walk & Kids Run Where 
1:00 p.m. Saturday, Nov. 14, 2015 Categories 
Events, Kids | Family, Sports The Run for the WASP is a patriotic and challenging Timed 5K Race to celebrate Veterans Day honoring the World War II Women Airforce Service Pilots (WASP) and All Veterans. The event will be held at the National WASP WWII Museum in Sweetwater and is supported by the Wounded Warrior Project. The 5K Run is a family event and includes a 1.3 Mile Fun Walk as well as a Kids Run. Day-of registration begins at 11 a.m. at the Museum located at 210 Avenger Field in Sweetwater with the race starting at 1 p.m. A WWII Aircraft flyover will start the race with American flags lining the course and medals will be awarded by Dyess Air Force Base Personnel. For more information and on-line pre-registration go to http://waspmuseum.org or call the Museum at 325-235-0099. The National WASP WWII Museum will be open free of charge during the festivities. $25 Runners & Walkers ($20 Pre-Registration) $20 Students and Military $10 Kids 12 and under
